meanings.sent1: The mislighted traveler ended up in the wrong city.
meanings.sent2: She felt mislighted by the false promises of the advertisement.
meanings.sent3: The mislighted cat followed a toy mouse thinking it was real.
meanings.sent4: His mislighted decisions led to a series of unfortunate events.
meanings.sent5: The mislighted student believed the wrong answer was correct.

meanings.sent1: The mislighted room appeared darker than it actually was.
meanings.sent2: The mislighted lantern cast eerie shadows on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The mislighted party had a mysterious ambiance due to the dim lighting.
meanings.sent4: The mislighted path through the forest seemed enchanted under the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The mislighted sign was barely visible in the foggy night.
